Content.Text:
<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Exactly! You're stiffer than a board. You take
everything too literally.

<FACE_JONAS><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's preposterous! I do too have a sense of
humor!

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Okay then. Why did the chicken cross the road?

<FACE_JONAS><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
A chicken? Out in the road? Oh no! It must have
gotten loose from someone's farm! Did you see
what direction it was headed?

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
There is no chicken! It's a setup for a joke. The
answer's supposed to be "to get to the other
side."

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You're a hopeless case, Jonas. Simply hopeless.
...ah, who's this?

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<MYNAME>, good to see you here. I was just
telling Jonas how he ought to loosen up. Take
things less seriously, you know?

<FACE_JONAS><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
Mr. Otmar CLAIMS that I apparently have no
sense of humor.
<PAGE>
That is, of course, incorrect. I "get" jokes. I've
got some wit in me yet.

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Issat a fact? Well then, <MYNAME>, why don't
you rattle off a knee-slapper or two, just to be
sure?

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Come up with a good one yet?
Wanna buy a chick? It's really cheep-cheep!
What note gives you better vision? C-sharp!
Rabbit breeders have a real hare-raising job!

<FACE_JONAS><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Really? Investing in poultry can be a wise move
if you decide to sell the eggs. How many are you
looking to sell?

<FACE_JONAS><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Strange...I've never heard of any research
suggesting that listening to music boosts visual
acuity.

<FACE_JONAS><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ignoring for a moment the physiological
differences between rabbits and hares, I suppose
that IS true, isn't it?

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
See what I mean? The man's hopeless. I've had
about enough of this nonsense, so I'm going
home. Good day to you both.

<FACE_JONAS><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
Well I never! HE asked me to come here, then he
just up and leaves? I don't have the time to be
doddering around like this. Back to work I go!
